section.name: Etherialization
section.p: The etherialization stage is the component equivalent of an object finalization. Etherialization covers the stopping of a running component and subsequent disposal. Initiation of the etherialization phase on a component instance is exclusively controlled by it's container.

td.p: A component implementing the the Startable lifecycle interface will be shutdown by the container.
A component may participate in end-of-life processing by implementing the Disposable lifecycle interface. An implementation will typically released references during this stage.
